results.title: Association of pregnancy outcomes in women with type 2 diabetes treated with metformin versus insulin when becoming pregnant
results.text_hl: In the current study, the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ group had a lower risk of @<m>DISEASE_163000</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:163000 @@@congenital malformations@@@ compared with the @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ group.

results.title: Major malformations risk following early pregnancy exposure to metformin: a systematic review and meta-analysis
results.text_hl: The authors also aimed to analyze the risk of major @<m>DISEASE_163000</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:163000 @@@congenital malformations@@@ (@DISEASE_Epilepsy_Tonic_Clonic @DISEASE_MESH:D004830 @@@MCMs@@@) after maternal @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ intake for @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2DM@@@; however, due to the insufficient number of studies, it was not feasible.

results.title: Metformin-stimulated AMPK-alpha1 promotes microvascular repair in acute lung injury.
results.journal: Am J Physiol Lung Cell Mol Physiol
results.text_hl: Our findings provide novel evidence for @GENE_PRKAA1 @GENE_65248 @@@AMPK-alpha1@@@ as a vascular repair mechanism important in the pulmonary response to @DISEASE_Sepsis @DISEASE_MESH:D018805 @@@sepsis@@@ and identify a role for @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment in the management of @<m>DISEASE_163000</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:163000 @@@capillary injury@@@.
